Mahmoud Kabil (Arabic: , a mụrụ na Mee 19, 1946) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya UNICEF Goodwill maka Middle East na North Africa
Kabil jere ozi dịka onye isi na ndị agha nke ndị agha pụrụ iche nke Egypt tupu ọ ghọọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-ekwe nkwa na ihe nkiri Ijipt n'oge afọ 1970
N'ịbụ onye e depụtara n'afọ 1980, Kabil kwagara na United States ma were afọ iri na anọ n'ime ihe nkiri

Ọ laghachiri n'ụzọ gara nke ọma mgbe ọ laghachiri Egypt n'afọ 1993, ma kemgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri 50 na usoro TV n'ụzọ ọ ga-aghọ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị ewu ewu na Egypt
Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke itinye aka na United Nations gasịrị, a kpọrọ Kabil onye nnọchi anya UNICEF Goodwill n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2003.
A mụrụ Mahmoud Kabil na Cairo, Egypt
Ibrahim Kabil, bụ onye isi nke ọrụ ego n'ime obodo na Alexandria na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ yana Minista na-ahụ maka ego na ọchịchị onyinyo nke ndị Saadi na-emegide ya tupu nnupụisi nke afọ 1952
Mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1959, Mahmoud dị afọ iri na abụọ
Kabil gụrụ akwụkwọ na Lycee Francais nke Alexandria tupu ọ banye n'usuu ndị agha nke Egypt n'afọ 1964 mgbe ọ dị afọ 18
N'ịbụ onye jere ozi ruo afọ 1973 dịka onye isi na onye isi na ndị agha pụrụ iche, Kabil sonyere na Agha Yemen, Agha Ụbọchị Isii, na Agha Attrition.
Tupu mkpebi ya ịbanye, onye nduzi Youssef Chahine bịakwutere Kabil banyere ime otu n'ime ihe nkiri ya
Ọ bụ ezie na Kabil jụrụ onyinye ahụ n'oge ahụ, ọ ga-emecha mezigharịa mmekọrịta ya na Chahine mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ agha
Chahine, onye a na-ekwu na ọ malitere ọrụ Omar Sharif, weere Kabil n'okpuru nku ya wee guzobe ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-eto eto na-ekwe nkwa na ihe nkiri Egypt n'oge afọ 1970
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri ndị a ma ama nke Kabil n'oge a gụnyere Chahine's The Sparrow, Love Under the Rain (dabere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Naguib Mahfouz), na The Damned (nke King Lear).
